item.title: Destruction
item.description: Funny online first-person shooter. Think about it as Team Fortress 2 + Minecraft. From TF2 it borrowed cartoony visual style, humour, and the idea of characters with different mechanics. Minecraft inspired us to add independent NPCs and sandbox mechanics allowing players to build simple constructions. The project hasn’t been launched, sources were lost. I uploaded all screenshots and renders I’d found there. Stack Art: Blender, GIMP, ZBrush Dev: Unity, Unet, MonoDevelop Cubic Map One of the ideas was to make maps cubic.
